content: कौमुदी [कुमुदस्येयं प्रकाशकत्वात् अण् ङीष् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Moonlight; शशिना सह याति कौमुदी <ls>Ku. 4. 33</ls>; शशिनमुपगतेयं कौमुदी मेघमुक्तं <ls>R. 6. 85</ls>; (the word is thus popularly derived:--कौ मोदंते जना यस्यां तेनासौ कौमुदी मता). {@--2@} Anything serving as moonlight, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} causing delight and balmy coolness; त्वमस्य लोकस्य च नेत्रकौमुदी <ls>Ku. 5. 71</ls>; या कौमुदी नयनयोर्भवतः सुजन्मा <ls>Māl. 1. 34</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> चंद्रिका. {@--3@} The full moon day in Kārtika. {@--4@} The full moon day in Āśvina. {@--5@} Festivity (in general). {@--6@} Particularly, a festive day on which temples, houses &c. are illuminated. {@--7@} (At the end of titles of works &c.) Elucidation, throwing light on the subject treated; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} तर्ककौमुदी, सांख्यतत्त्वकै मुदी, सिद्धांतकौमुदी &c.
